page.title: 10Recreation Pubs Whittington
page.content: There are three pubs in Whittington -the{Boote}Inn,the{White Lion,}and the {Penrhos}Arms.The largest of these is the Boote.The White Lion and the Boote serve hot and cold meals at lunch time and in the evening and so do the Penrhos.The White Lion has five bedrooms and the Boote eight but the Penrhos is non-residential.Each of the pubs has its own private carpark.The Lion and the Boote are 200 years old.The Lion opens at 10.00a.m.but doesn't serve alcohol until noon.In the evening it opens at 7.00p.m.and closes at 10.30p.m.Every year the Penrhos holds a Country and Western Day which takes place at the rear of the pub.
